0: Every sunset feel righter, sunshines feel brighter
1: Please light ya lighter for the producer and the writer
2: Feel like God wrote this, I'm just here to quote this
3: I don't know if you noticed, them accident pictures is bogus
4: Doctor, doctor, would you please say somethin'?
5: I know I almost was the final destination
6: I musta had a blessin' from Pastor Mason
7: Cause that trip to L.A. coulda been my last vacation
8: And, man, I know I can
9: Drop a down payment on that Porsche Cayenne
10: But, what, I went along with the plan
11: Paid for my own video, directed by my man
12: I know God was holdin' my hand
13: Wouldn't let me go before I went before Def Poetry Jam
14: Wouldn't let me throw in the towel 'fore I got to throwin' some vowels
16: Out the blue girls got a crush on me like I did beats for Mr. Cheeks
17: And since the accident, they tellin' me that it's the cheeks
18: But if you look at history, the last rapper that almost died
19: Sold 6.5 'cept I'm comin' from the Chi
20: Now even though I ain't wired up
22: You ain't seen my concerts lately, they be linin' up
23: You ain't seen my girls lately, they be tryin' to cut
24: And they heard about my girl so I still chill
25: Cause Monica Lewinsky already killed Bill
26: And that girl that was with Kobe tried to go for the kill
27: I think he put it in the wrong Holyfield
28: Can I take a minute with y'all to be totally real?
29: Far as my jaw and all, it ain't totally heal
30: If I would have died, 10/23 of last year
31: That would have threw a monkey wrench in my whole career
32: But me, I took the worst thing, turn it into the best thing
33: I'm from the Chi, I guess it's just a Midwest thing
34: Times like this make life interesting
35: Times like this make me count my blessings
36: Cause you could run around like King of the Chi
37: But God could take that in a blink of a eye
38: I remember Cedars-Sinai and all those cryin'
39: Mama, I'm sorry for almost dyin'
45: Don I'ma John Monopolize the game
46: Add on Benny Medina, we gon' take 'em to the cleaners
47: I'm Kanye West, the college dropout slash genius
title: Through The Wire Remix
